#summary How-To compile and run webQam starting from source archive
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

= Introduction =
 # Download the src archive from [http://code.google.com/p/webqam/downloads/list]
 # Unpack the archive and place your promt inside the folder `webQam-x.x.x` where x.x.x is the version number
 # Type `qmake`, `make` and wait...
 # When the process is finished, you can find the compiled binary file in bin/
